resources.string: Primus Jewels is a New York based jewelry organization working from sourcing to gemstone and jewelry manufacturing to distribution to marketing in full circle. With superior first hand market knowledge of both - a supplier and a consumer, the company is positioned to utilize its in-house product development and marketing teams to predict and forecast jewelry trends. Technology enables seamless communication amongst all centers of the world, i.e. procurement offices in India (Jaipur), manufacturing units in China and Thailand, and procurement at various places in Africa."Hanya Contoh Bisa Di ganti Semata mata"

Primus Jewels is a New York based jewelry organization working from sourcing to gemstone and jewelry manufacturing to distribution to marketing in full circle. With superior first hand market knowledge of both - a supplier and a consumer, the company is positioned to utilize its in-house product development and marketing teams to predict and forecast jewelry trends. Technology enables seamless communication amongst all centers of the world, i.e. procurement offices in India (Jaipur), manufacturing units in China and Thailand, and procurement at various places in Africa."Hanya Contoh Bisa Di ganti Semata mata"
